entry.title: Re: Business by Design Screentypes?
entry.content:
Hello thomas_mueller8,

The QC and TI screens are part of the "Thing-Based Navigation", which is valid only for SAP C4C (currently known as SAP Sales Cloud and Service Cloud), which Jens is using in his video.

The equivalent of these screens in ByD is:

  • OIF - Object Instance Floorplan (for TI)
  • QAF - Quick Activity Floorplan (for QC).

They belong to the "Object-Based Navigation" which is used in ByD.

You can refer to below help pages related to screen types for further information:
Generate Screens for a Business Object
Screen Types 
Object-Based Navigation and Thing-Based Navigation

Also, Jens videos are present in these two blogs:
Video-How-To's for SAP Cloud Applications Studio 
Getting started with the Cloud Application Studio - New video series 

I hope this helps!

Best regards,
Thiago

entry.title: Small program to test the SCSM_NW_WORKLOAD interface for reading ABAP statistics data
entry.content:
The "SCSM_NW_WORKLOAD interface" corresponds to the SAP note 1053634 - SCSM_NW_WORKLOAD interface for reading ABAP statistics data - SAP for Me. In fact, it's the name of the function group containing the function modules which can be called to read the ABAP statistics data (data displayed by the transaction codes ST03, ST03N, STAT).

There are very few code snippets about these function modules, so I decided to publish a little test program which calls these function modules. This program is useful in debug to find out how the ABAP statistics data are structured, to build your own program with the data you need.

The program calls the following RFC-enabled function modules:

  • SWNC_GET_DIRECTORY_FRAME
  • SWNC_GET_AGGREGATES_FRAME
  • SWNC_GET_SNAPSHOT_FRAME
  • SWNC_GET_STATRECS_FRAME

It calls SWNC_GET_DIRECTORY_FRAME and SWNC_GET_AGGREGATES_FRAME to read the whole aggregated data (total and by server).

It calls SWNC_GET_SNAPSHOT_FRAME and SWNC_GET_STATRECS_FRAME to read the detailed records of ABAP statistics data of the last 3 days, with a time frame of 60 minutes (these filter and setting can be changed).

I used this program in an ABAP 7.40 SP 23 system.

Happy coding and feel free to publish your own code snippets!

Sandra

REPORT z_read_st03n_data.
* Note 1053634:
* With the SAP upgrade to SAP_BASIS 7.0(NW 2004s), both the methods and
* the corresponding function modules for reading ABAP statistics data
* have changed. The SAPWL_GLOB_STAT function group can no longer be
* used as of SAP_BASIS 7.0.
* (SAPWL_GLOB_STAT = SAPWL_STATREC_FROM_REMOTE_SYS, etc.)
* The new function group includes the following four function modules:
* - SWNC_GET_DIRECTORY_FRAME
* - SWNC_GET_AGGREGATES_FRAME
* - SWNC_GET_SNAPSHOT_FRAME
* - SWNC_GET_STATRECS_FRAME
DATA(select_from_systems) = VALUE swncgl_t_dest( ).
DATA(all_directories)  = VALUE swncgl_t_alldir( ).
DATA(protocol_allrcinf) = VALUE swncgl_t_allrcinf( ).

select_from_systems = VALUE #(
  ( select_system  = sy-sysid
*    select_servers =
) ).
CALL FUNCTION 'SWNC_GET_DIRECTORY_FRAME'
  EXPORTING
    select_from_systems = select_from_systems "sy-sysid
  IMPORTING
    all_directories     = all_directories
    protocol            = protocol_allrcinf.

DATA(select_system) = VALUE swncsysdest( ).
DATA(systemid) = VALUE swncsysid( ).
DATA(instance) = VALUE swnchostname( ).
DATA(periodtype) = VALUE swncperitype( ).
DATA(periodstrt) = VALUE swncdatum( ).
DATA(summary_only) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(tasktype) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggtasktype( ).
DATA(tasktimes) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggtasktimes( ).
DATA(times) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggtimes( ).
DATA(dbprocs) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggdbprocs( ).
DATA(extsystem) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggextsystem( ).
DATA(tcdet) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggtcdet( ).
DATA(frontend) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggfrontend( ).
DATA(memory) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggmemory( ).
DATA(spool) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggspool( ).
DATA(spoolact) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggspoolact( ).
DATA(tablerec) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggtablerec( ).
DATA(usertcode) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggusertcode( ).
DATA(userworkload) = VALUE swncgl_t_agguserworkload( ).
DATA(rfcclnt) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggrfcclnt( ).
DATA(rfcclntdest) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggrfcclntdest( ).
DATA(rfcsrvr) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggrfcsrvr( ).
DATA(rfcsrvrdest) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggrfcsrvrdest( ).
DATA(astat) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggappstat( ).
DATA(hitlist_database) = VALUE swncgl_t_hitlist( ).
DATA(hitlist_resptime) = VALUE swncgl_t_hitlist( ).
DATA(hitlist_astat_db) = VALUE swncgl_t_hitlistappl( ).
DATA(hitlist_astat_resptime) = VALUE swncgl_t_hitlistappl( ).
DATA(comp_hierarchy) = VALUE swncgl_t_comphiertxt( ).
DATA(org_units) = VALUE swncgl_t_orgunit( ).
DATA(dbcon) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggdbc( ).
DATA(webc) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggwebclnt( ).
DATA(webcd) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggwebdest( ).
DATA(webs) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggwebclnt( ).
DATA(websd) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggwebdest( ).
DATA(vmc) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggvmc( ).
DATA(protocol_rcinf) = VALUE swncgl_t_rcinf( ).
DATA(trex) = VALUE swncgl_t_aggtrex( ).

LOOP AT all_directories REFERENCE INTO DATA(directory).
  summary_only = abap_false.
  CALL FUNCTION 'SWNC_GET_AGGREGATES_FRAME'
    EXPORTING
*      select_system          = " RFC destination?
      systemid               = directory->assigndsys
      instance               = directory->component
      periodtype             = directory->periodtype
      periodstrt             = directory->periodstrt
      summary_only           = summary_only
    IMPORTING
      tasktype               = tasktype
      tasktimes              = tasktimes
      times                  = times
      dbprocs                = dbprocs
      extsystem              = extsystem
      tcdet                  = tcdet
      frontend               = frontend
      memory                 = memory
      spool                  = spool
      spoolact               = spoolact
      tablerec               = tablerec
      usertcode              = usertcode
      userworkload           = userworkload
      rfcclnt                = rfcclnt
      rfcclntdest            = rfcclntdest
      rfcsrvr                = rfcsrvr
      rfcsrvrdest            = rfcsrvrdest
      astat                  = astat
      hitlist_database       = hitlist_database
      hitlist_resptime       = hitlist_resptime
      hitlist_astat_db       = hitlist_astat_db
      hitlist_astat_resptime = hitlist_astat_resptime
      comp_hierarchy         = comp_hierarchy
      org_units              = org_units
      dbcon                  = dbcon
      webc                   = webc
      webcd                  = webcd
      webs                   = webs
      websd                  = websd
      vmc                    = vmc
      protocol               = protocol_rcinf
      trex                   = trex.
  ASSERT 1 = 1. " debug helper
ENDLOOP.

DATA(read_start_date) = VALUE swncdatum( ).
DATA(read_start_time) = VALUE swncuzeit( ).
DATA(read_end_date) = VALUE swncdatum( ).
DATA(read_end_time) = VALUE swncuzeit( ).
DATA(read_time_zone) = VALUE swnctimezone( ).
DATA(read_client) = VALUE swncmandt( ).
DATA(read_username) = VALUE swncuname( ).
DATA(flag_exclude_username) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(read_transids) = VALUE swncgl_t_transid( ).
DATA(read_workprocess) = VALUE swncrshrt( ).
DATA(read_only_mainrecords) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(read_stat) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(read_astat) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(wait_seconds) = VALUE i( ).
DATA(max_records) = VALUE swncrecs( ).
DATA(get_comp_hierarchy) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(get_org_units) = VALUE swnc_cflag( ).
DATA(all_statrecs) = VALUE swncgl_t_allrecs( ).
DATA(protocol) = VALUE swncgl_t_allrcinf( ).
DATA(ext_esi_records) = VALUE swncgl_t_esirecs( ).
DATA(ext_passport_records) = VALUE swncgl_t_passportrecs( ).
DATA(webservice_records) = VALUE swncgl_t_webservicerecs( ).
DATA(trex_records) = VALUE swncgl_t_trexrecs( ).

read_start_date = sy-datum - 3.
read_start_time = '000000'.
read_end_date = sy-datum.
read_end_time = sy-uzeit.
read_stat = abap_true.
*read_astat = abap_true.
max_records = -1.

data(time_resolution) = value swnctimeres( ).
data(tasktypes_per_workprocess) = value swnc_cflag( ).
data(tcodes_with_dynpro_number) = value swnc_cflag( ).
data(terminal_instead_of_username) = value swnc_cflag( ).
data(ashitl_database) = value swncgl_t_hitlistappl( ).
data(ashitl_resptime) = value swncgl_t_hitlistappl( ).

time_resolution = 60. "60 minutes

call function 'SWNC_GET_SNAPSHOT_FRAME'
  EXPORTING
*    select_system                = SPACE
*    select_server                =
*    read_time_zone               =
    read_start_date              = read_start_date
    read_start_time              = read_start_time
    read_end_date                = read_end_date
    read_end_time                = read_end_time
    read_client                  = read_client
    read_username                = read_username
    read_workprocess             = read_workprocess
    read_stat                    = read_stat
    read_astat                   = read_astat
    wait_seconds                 = wait_seconds
    time_resolution              = time_resolution
    tasktypes_per_workprocess    = tasktypes_per_workprocess
    tcodes_with_dynpro_number    = tcodes_with_dynpro_number
    terminal_instead_of_username = terminal_instead_of_username
    max_records                  = max_records
  IMPORTING
    tasktype                     = tasktype
    tasktimes                    = tasktimes
    times                        = times
    dbprocs                      = dbprocs
    extsystem                    = extsystem
    tcdet                        = tcdet
    frontend                     = frontend
    memory                       = memory
    spool                        = spool
    spoolact                     = spoolact
    tablerec                     = tablerec
    usertcode                    = usertcode
    userworkload                 = userworkload
    rfcclnt                      = rfcclnt
    rfcclntdest                  = rfcclntdest
    rfcsrvr                      = rfcsrvr
    rfcsrvrdest                  = rfcsrvrdest
    astat                        = astat
    hitlist_database             = hitlist_database
    hitlist_resptime             = hitlist_resptime
    ashitl_database              = ashitl_database
    ashitl_resptime              = ashitl_resptime
    comp_hierarchy               = comp_hierarchy
    org_units                    = org_units
    dbcon                        = dbcon
    webc                         = webc
    webcd                        = webcd
    webs                         = webs
    websd                        = websd
    vmc                          = vmc
    protocol                     = protocol.

CALL FUNCTION 'SWNC_GET_STATRECS_FRAME'
  EXPORTING
    select_from_systems   = select_from_systems
    read_start_date       = read_start_date
    read_start_time       = read_start_time
    read_end_date         = read_end_date
    read_end_time         = read_end_time
    read_time_zone        = read_time_zone
    read_client           = read_client
    read_username         = read_username
    flag_exclude_username = flag_exclude_username
    read_transids         = read_transids
    read_workprocess      = read_workprocess
    read_only_mainrecords = read_only_mainrecords
    read_stat             = read_stat
    read_astat            = read_astat
    wait_seconds          = wait_seconds
    max_records           = max_records
    get_comp_hierarchy    = get_comp_hierarchy
    get_org_units         = get_org_units
  IMPORTING
    all_statrecs          = all_statrecs
    protocol              = protocol
    ext_esi_records       = ext_esi_records
    ext_passport_records  = ext_passport_records
    webservice_records    = webservice_records
    trex_records          = trex_records.

LOOP AT all_statrecs REFERENCE INTO DATA(statrecs).
  LOOP AT statrecs->statrecs REFERENCE INTO DATA(statrec)
      WHERE mainrec-tcode IS NOT INITIAL.
    WRITE: / statrec->mainrec-account, statrec->mainrec-starttimestamp, statrec->mainrec-tcode.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDLOOP.
ASSERT 1 = 1. " debug helper
